summary: Test suite that validates the lake package implementation for MODFLOW 6, covering creation of lake objects, handling of connection and outlet data, rendering of lake geometries and time‑series on both structured and unstructured grids, and writing of lake data to model files, including transient scenarios.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of lake modeling features within the groundwater simulation framework, enabling reliable simulation of lake‑groundwater interactions for engineering and environmental analyses.
